item.title: 印度市场热点：释放控股公司的价值
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets.】

item.title: 中国农民准备应对更多降雨和农作物洪涝风险
item.description: 预计本周中国中部和南部部分地区仍将持续强降雨，这些地区的强降水已导致人员伤亡和农作物被洪水毁坏。【原文：Heavy rains are expected to continue in parts of central and southern China this week, battering regions where high precipitation has already led to loss of life and flood damage to crops.】

item.title: 新加坡将出售十多年来最多的住宅用地
item.description: 即使开发商的兴趣降温，新加坡仍在推进一项计划，以释放自 2013 年以来最多的私人住房供应。【原文：Singapore is moving forward with a plan to release the most private housing supply since 2013 even as interest from developers cools.】

item.title: 捷克大亨收购悉尼上市煤矿公司失败
item.description: 悉尼上市冶金煤炭生产商科罗纳多全球资源公司（Coronado Global Resources Inc.【原文：The owner of a majority stake in Sydney-listed metallurgical coal producer Coronado Global Resources Inc. terminated its sale to Czech tycoon Pavel Tykac’s Sev.en Global Investments.】

item.title: 印度古吉拉特邦新金融中心希望到 2025 年实现实时美元结算
item.description: 据一位高级官员透露，印度最新的古吉拉特邦金融中心很可能在今年晚些时候或 2025 年初开始实行实时美元结算，这一举措将增强印度对外国投资者的吸引力。【原文：Real-time dollar settlement in India’s newest financial hub in Gujarat is likely to become operational later this year or by early 2025, according to a senior official, a step that could burnish the country’s appeal to foreign investors.】

item.title: 波音竞购 Spirit Aero，737 供应商每股价值 35 美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，波音公司已提出收购 Spirit AeroSystems Holdings Inc.【原文：Boeing Co. has offered to acquire Spirit AeroSystems Holdings Inc. in a deal funded mostly by stock that values the key supplier at about $35 per share, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 摩根大通基金押注补涨行情将提振亚洲芯片股
item.description: 一位顶级基金经理表示，鉴于亚洲芯片股的估值比美国同行便宜，它们还有进一步反弹的空间。【原文：Chip stocks in Asia have room to rally further given their cheaper valuation compared to US peers, according to a top fund manager.】

item.title: 澳大利亚家庭仍对澳大利亚央行加息持悲观态度
item.description: 6 月份，澳大利亚消费者的情绪依然低迷，这反映了人们对持续通胀可能促使储备银行恢复加息的担忧。【原文：Australia’s consumers remained downbeat in June, reflecting concern that persistent inflation could prompt the Reserve Bank to resume raising interest rates.】

item.title: 印度央行决策者在利率增长问题上意见不一
item.description: 印度储备银行货币政策委员会的外部成员似乎正在形成一种共识，即高利率会损害经济增长，这表明有关任何宽松政策时机的争论正在加剧。【原文：A consensus appears to be emerging among the external members of the Reserve Bank of India’s monetary policy committee that high interest rates are damaging to economic growth, a sign that the debate over the timing of any easing is intensifying.】

item.title: 地缘政治紧张局势升级，石油保持涨势
item.description: 由于投资者权衡了从也门到俄罗斯不断加剧的地缘政治紧张局势可能带来的影响，石油保持了涨势。【原文：Oil held a gain as investors weighed the potential fallout from rising geopolitical tensions from Yemen to Russia.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。美股连续第三天受英伟达（Nvidia）拖累下跌。加拿大正在瞄准中国的电动汽车。美联储正在考虑对银行资本规则进行更为宽松的调整。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. US stocks were dragged down with Nvidia for a third day. Canada is taking aim at Chinese EVs. And the Fed is contemplating a less-stringent rework of bank capital rules. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 全球气候倡议组织敦促日本将可再生能源增加两倍
item.description: 在日本审查其国家能源战略之际，一项可再生能源倡议呼吁日本将其清洁电力产能增加两倍，该倡议的成员包括苹果公司、Meta Platforms 公司和耐克公司。【原文：A renewable energy initiative, whose members include Apple Inc., Meta Platforms Inc. and Nike Inc., called on Japan to triple its capacity of clean electricity as the country reviews its national energy strategy.】

item.title: EDF 在英国能源供应商中客户服务排名最差
item.description: 根据客户服务记录，EDF 能源有限公司在英国能源供应商排名中跌落至末尾，这是整个行业消费者不满趋势的一部分。【原文：EDF Energy Ltd. tumbled to the bottom of the list of energy suppliers in the UK based on its customer service record, part of an industry-wide trend of dissatisfied consumers.】

item.title: 忘掉 160，交易员认为日元将跌至 170
item.description: 日元有可能跌至 1986 年最后一次出现的水平，看跌的交易商们对政府干预以支撑日本陷入困境的货币的前景并不担心。【原文：The yen is at risk of sliding to levels last seen in 1986, with bearish traders unfazed by the specter of government intervention to bolster Japan’s embattled currency.】

item.title: 亚洲表现最好的股市似乎有望取得更多涨幅
item.description: 随着经济状况改善的迹象增强了这个亚洲今年表现最好的市场的前景，巴基斯坦股市的牛市似乎还有更长的路要走。【原文：The bull run in Pakistani stocks looks to have more legs as signs of improving economic conditions bolster the outlook for Asia’s best-performing market this year.】

item.title: 关税在即，为中国电动汽车制造商套期保值变得越来越昂贵
item.description: 随着世界各国政府计划征收新的关税，交易员们正准备迎接中国电动汽车制造商股价的更大波动。【原文：Traders are preparing for more swings ahead for shares of Chinese electric-car makers as governments around the world plan new tariffs.】

item.title: 英伟达引发科技界担忧，亚洲期货市场低迷：市场综述
item.description: 由于市场猜测科技板块的涨势可能已经乏力，华尔街今天的表现喜忧参半，亚洲股票基准将在狭窄区间内交投。【原文：Asian equity benchmarks were set to trade within tight ranges following a mixed day on Wall Street on speculation the tech sector rally may be running out of steam.】

item.title: 墨西哥燃料进口增加，阻碍阿姆鲁实现能源独立目标
item.description: 墨西哥国营石油公司 5 月份的汽油进口量比前一个月增加了 11%，这表明该公司正在努力实现总统安德烈斯-曼努埃尔-洛佩斯-奥夫拉多尔（Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador）提出的使国家在炼油方面实现自给自足的目标。【原文：Mexico’s state oil company imported 11% more gasoline in May than the previous month, a sign it’s struggling to live up to President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador’s goal of making the nation self-sufficient when it comes refining.】

item.title: 英伟达股价暴跌 13% 交易员在图表中寻找支撑点
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）连续三天以 4,300 亿美元的价格暴跌，令交易员转而从技术分析中寻找底部的线索。【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s three-day, $430 billion selloff has traders turning to technical analysis for clues on where the bottom may be.】

item.title: L Catterton和员工将出售1400万股Birkenstock股票
item.description: 私募股权公司 L Catterton 和 Birkenstock Holding Plc 的一批员工正准备出售这家在美国上市的鞋类制造商的 1400 万股股票，几天前，该公司的股价创下了自首次公开募股以来的最高水平。【原文：Private equity firm L Catterton and a group of employees of Birkenstock Holding Plc are offering to sell 14 million shares of the US-traded footwear maker, days after it hit its highest level since its initial public offering.】

item.title: 对冲基金削减墨西哥比索赌注，创历史最大跌幅之一
item.description: 墨西哥比索大选出人意料地扰乱了市场，并使人们对这一世界顶级货币交易之一的前景产生了怀疑，对冲基金随之削减了对墨西哥比索的押注。【原文：Hedge funds slashed their bets on the Mexican peso in the aftermath of an election surprise that roiled markets and cast doubt on the outlook for what had been one of the world’s top currency trades.】

item.title: 养老基金 "光明超级 "因担忧中国而减持澳大利亚股票
item.description: Brighter Super 是一家规模达 320 亿澳元（约合 213 亿美元）的澳大利亚养老基金，该基金以中国经济放缓的影响为由，减少了对国内股票的配置。【原文：Brighter Super, a A$32 billion ($21.3 billion) Australian pension fund, has reduced its allocation to domestic equities, citing the impact of the slowing Chinese economy.】

item.title: 对冲基金过去十年每年盈利 20% 瞄准铀矿勘探与开采
item.description: 一家绩优对冲基金押注铀生产商 NexGen Energy Ltd. 的回调将是短暂的，因为该行业日益增长的吸引力使这家初创公司处于被收购的有利位置。【原文：A top performing hedge fund is betting the pullback in uranium producer NexGen Energy Ltd. will be short lived, as the industry’s growing appeal leaves the startup well placed for a potential takeover.】

item.title: 肯-格里芬起诉美国国税局数据泄露案以和解告终
item.description: 美国国税局同意和解对冲基金经理肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）提起的诉讼，格里芬指控国税局未能保护他的机密财务信息不被承包商窃取并泄露给 ProPublica。【原文：The US Internal Revenue Service agreed to settle a lawsuit brought by hedge fund manager Ken Griffin that accused the agency of failing to protect his confidential financial information from a contractor who stole his tax data and leaked it to ProPublica.】

item.title: 对冲基金五年来最看空美国汽油
item.description: 由于对供应过剩的担忧加剧，对冲基金和基金经理将看跌美国汽油的押注提高到五年多来的最高点。【原文：Hedge funds and money managers boosted bearish bets against US gasoline to the highest in more than five years as worries about oversupply grow.】

item.title: 东欧顶级公用事业公司 CEZ 将派发 12 亿美元股息
item.description: 捷克最大的电力生产商 CEZ AS 将派发每股 52 克朗的股息，派息总额为 280 亿克朗（约合 12 亿美元）。【原文：The dominant Czech power producer CEZ AS will pay a dividend of 52 koruna per share, representing a total payout of 28 billion koruna ($1.2 billion), the state-controlled utility said.】

item.title: 伯恩斯坦分析师称，加密货币可能成为新的 "特朗普贸易
item.description: 伯恩斯坦公司（Bernstein）的分析师表示，随着共和党前景的改善，以及该党的标杆人物越来越多地接受支持加密货币的观点，加密货币可能会在当前的大选周期中成为主要的 "特朗普交易"。【原文：Crypto may emerge as the primary “Trump Trade” during the current election cycle with Republican prospects improving and the party’s standard bearer increasingly embracing a pro-crypto viewpoint, according to Bernstein analysts.】

item.title: 错误的英伟达杠杆赌注在暴跌前吸引了 7.4 亿美元资金
item.description: 对日间交易者来说，人工智能推动了股票狂热，是前所未有的赚钱赌注，每周都能带来两位数的回报。【原文：For day traders riding the AI-fueled stock mania, it’s been a money-minting bet like no other — offering double-digit returns week in and week out.】

item.title: 杜邦水务部门引起潜在买家的兴趣
item.description: 据知情人士透露，美国化工集团杜邦公司正计划分拆其水处理业务，该业务正引起潜在行业买家的收购兴趣。【原文：DuPont de Nemours Inc.’s water treatment business, which the US chemicals group is planning to spin out, is drawing separate takeover interest from potential industry buyers, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 中国顶级锂业公司向墨西哥提出国际索赔
item.description: 在拉美国家取消了一个价值超过 10 亿美元的潜在采矿项目后，赣锋锂业已对墨西哥提起国际仲裁。【原文：Ganfeng Lithium has filed an international arbitration case against Mexico after the Latin American nation canceled a potential mining project valued at more than $1 billion.】
